job.title: Software Engineer - New Grad 2022
job.description: ltstronggtltugtWhat Were Looking ForltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtStytch is the platform for user authentication We make it simple for developers to build complex authentication flows in a matter of minutes We look for engineers who are excited to think about what to build not just how to build it whether that be a new API product a feature in our developer dashboard or a new data pipelineltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Excites YoultbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtA collaborative environment with a tight feedback loop between the work you do and the impact it has on usersltligtltligtSolving problems with pragmatic solutions  you know when to make trade offs between complexity and shipping quicklyltligtltligtShaping the culture and growing the team through recruiting mentorship and establishing best practicesltligtltligtLearning new skills and technologies in a fast paced environment  as a small start up things move quicklyltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Excites UsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtCuriosity and excitement to dive into complex problemsltligtltligtA degree in Computer Science or similarltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Success Looks LikeltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtTechnical  build foundations that enable our team to create experiences that delight developers and end usersltligtltligtOwnership  advocate for projects and solutions that you believe in and ship them to productionltligtltligtLeadership  level up your teammates by providing feedback and guidanceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtOur Tech StackltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtGo for back end servicesltligtltligtNode and Typescript for our web servicesltligtltligtReact on the front end ltligtltligtSwift for our iOS sdk and Kotlin for the Android sdkltligtltligtWe run on AWS with Kubernetes for containerizationltligtltligtgRPC and protobufs for internal service communicationltbrgtltligtltulgtltemgtWere looking to hire a GREAT team and that means hiring people who are highly empathetic ambitious and excited about building the future of user authentication You should feel empowered to apply for this role even if your experience doesnt exactly match up to our job description our job descriptions are directional and not perfect recipes for exactly what we need ltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtWe are committed to building a diverse inclusive and equitable workspace where everyone regardless of age education ethnicity gender sexual orientation or any personal characteristics feels like they belong We look forward to hearing from youltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltstronggtLearn more about our team and culture ltstronggtltstronggthereltstronggtltstronggtltstronggt
